data.comment: The match has started.
America have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 4, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in the half of America.
Pumas UNAM are coming forward and Alan Mozo gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 5, America have a goal kick.
Throw-in America.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a throw-in for America, close to Pumas UNAM's area.
In the minute 6, Giovani Dos Santos for America drives towards goal at Estadio Azteca. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick in a good position for America!
America's Santiago Caseres misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 8, Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
Free kick America.
Can America capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Pumas UNAM's half?
In the minute 11, In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Henry Martin of America gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 12, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Nicolas Benedetti of America smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 14, Facundo Waller gets his shot on target but fails to score for Pumas UNAM.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Mexico City.
In the minute 17, Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
America's Henry Martin breaks free at Estadio Azteca. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Azteca.
In the minute 19, America's Henry Martin gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In Mexico City America attack through Nicolas Benedetti. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
In the minute 20, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM close to the penalty box.
Throw-in high up the field for Pumas UNAM in Mexico City.
In the minute 22, America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Azteca.
America awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 25, Ball safe as America is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pumas UNAM needs to be cautious. America have an attacking throw-in.
America drives forward and Henry Martin gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 28, Facundo Waller (Pumas UNAM) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in America territory.
Goal! Juan Vigon gives Pumas UNAM a 0-1 lead in Mexico City.
In the minute 28, Great play from Juan Dinenno to set up the goal.
America have a goal kick.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a America throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half.
In the minute 31, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo waits before resuming play because Giovani Dos Santos for America is still down.
Giovani Dos Santos is back on his feet again.
Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
In the minute 36, Throw-in for Pumas UNAM in the half of America.
Pumas UNAM's Juan Dinenno is on target but unsuccessful.
In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 38, Can America capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Pumas UNAM's half?
Goal! Nicolas Benedetti levels the match at 1-1.
Henry Martin instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 40, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Giovani Dos Santos (America) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 42, America have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
America push forward at Estadio Azteca and Luis Fuentes gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Pumas UNAM defence.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 43, Can America get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pumas UNAM's half?
Throw-in for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Azteca.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 45, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick Pumas UNAM.
America are pushing forward but Federico Vinas's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 45, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to America in their own half.
In the minute 45, Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo blows to end the first-half.
The second half has started at Estadio Azteca.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
In the minute 47, Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Juan Iturbe (Pumas UNAM) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 49, America will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM drive upfield and Juan Dinenno gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a America defender.
Free kick for America in their own half.
In the minute 50, Play has been interrupted briefly in Mexico City to check on Oscar Jimenez, who is grimacing with pain.
Oscar Jimenez is back on the pitch.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to America.
In the minute 52, Pumas UNAM to take a throw-in in America territory.
Alan Mozo (Pumas UNAM) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 54, America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for America in their own half.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to America in their own half.
In the minute 55, Juan Iturbe heads in to make it 1-2 at Estadio Azteca.
That's a fine assist from Alejandro Mayorga.
Throw-in for America in the half of Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 58, Can America capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
America's Ramon Juarez attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
In the minute 59, Ball safe as America is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Pumas UNAM needs to be cautious. America have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for America in the half of Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 61, Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Nicolas Benedetti for America has been booked by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo and receives a first yellow card.
The match at Estadio Azteca has been interrupted briefly for a check on Facundo Waller, who is down injured.
In the minute 63, Pumas UNAM's Facundo Waller is back in action after a slight knock.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for America close to the penalty box.
Santiago Caseres (America) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 65, Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Azteca.
Alejandro Mayorga for Pumas UNAM gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
In the minute 67, America awarded a free kick in their own half.
Juan Dinenno is booked for the away team.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to Pumas UNAM in their own half.
In the minute 68, Miguel Herrera (America) is making a first substitution, with Leonardo Suarez replacing Giovani Dos Santos.
Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to America just outside Pumas UNAM's area.
In the minute 70, Pumas UNAM's Johan Vasquez has been booked in Mexico City.
America pushes forward through Richard Sanchez, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to America.
In the minute 72, Throw-in high up the field for America in Mexico City.
Throw-in America.
In the minute 74, It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Erik Lira is replacing Juan Vigon for the away team.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a free kick to America.
America are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 75, At Estadio Azteca, Alejandro Mayorga has been yellow-carded for the away team.
In Mexico City America attack through Sebastian Cordova. The finish is off target, however.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo awards Pumas UNAM a goal kick.
An attacking America player has been brought down in the area ... It's a penalty!
In the minute 79, Andres Iniestra (Pumas UNAM) has received a yellow card from Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Andres Iniestra has been booked for the second time in this match - the red card is coming out!
In the minute 81, Goal! The home team are now level through a Federico Vinas penalty.
Pumas UNAM awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 82, In Mexico City a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Leonel Lopez is on a sub for Juan Iturbe for Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo signals a Pumas UNAM throw-in in America's half.
In the minute 83, Free kick Pumas UNAM.
Corner awarded to Pumas UNAM.
Pumas UNAM surge into the attack at Estadio Azteca but Johan Vasquez’s header is off-target.
In the minute 85, Ball goes out of play for a America goal kick.
Throw-in for America close to the penalty box.
Federico Vinas of America gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 85, Goal kick for Pumas UNAM at Estadio Azteca.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Roger Martinez is replacing Henry Martin for America at Estadio Azteca.
Free kick for America in the half of Pumas UNAM.
In the minute 87, Miguel Herrera is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Azteca with Andres Ibarguen replacing Nicolas Benedetti.
America have been awarded a corner by Jorge Isaac Rojas Castillo.
In the minute 88, In Mexico City America drive forward through Luis Fuentes. His shot is on target but it's saved.
America's Santiago Caseres gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Pumas UNAM have a goal kick.
In the minute 89, America awarded a throw-in in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Mexico City.
Pumas UNAM's Andres Iniestra breaks free at Estadio Azteca. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for America at Estadio Azteca.
Throw-in for America in the half of Pumas UNAM.
At Estadio Azteca the fourth official shows that 4 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Pumas UNAM in their own half.
Ball safe as Pumas UNAM is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in America.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for America close to the penalty box.
Ball goes out of play for a Pumas UNAM goal kick.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-2.
The away team have replaced Carlos Gutierrez with Bryan Mendoza. This is the third substitution made today by Andres Lillini.
